Text:
For those who are uninformed....The Turner Diaries depicts a violent revolution in the United States which leads to the overthrow of the United States federal government, nuclear war, and, ultimately, to a race war leading to the extermination of all "impure" groups such as Jews, gay people, and non-whites. The book was called "explicitly racist and anti-Semitic" by The New York Times and has been labeled a "bible of the racist right" by the Southern Poverty Law Center.
So...unless you are a hatemonger, ya might want to pass on this one.
You must understand that retard skinheads have wet dreams after reading this stupid book of impossible scenarios, let them wet their beds in peace...
It's an interesting fact that the author of this book had to write the whole thing in red crayon, because he had already eaten the black one.

Sticks & stones...
Read at your own risk.
These stunted-brain hate-mongering right-wing dolts can read?! I did not know that.

I liked this book. It's an action packed pulp fiction. Those who call this "bible of the racist right" hasn't read it. There's nothing "biblical" or even lecturing about it. Just fiction with racist protagonists, which makes it very entertaining and unusual. It won't turn anyone racist who isn't allready.

I recomend it if you wan't to have some accessible fun and suspense for a couple of hours.
